mng: at once, right away, only, just (emphasis), as early as, already, as soon as, then, in that case, as many as, even if, to approach, to move towards, to undertake, to engage in, to suffer, subjected to, to accomplish, to take advantage of, to go with (of foods), with regard to, concerning

exm.mng: at once, right away, only, just (emphasis), as early as, already, as soon as, then, in that case, as many as, even if, to approach, to move towards, to undertake, to engage in, to suffer, subjected to, to accomplish, to take advantage of, to go with (of foods), with regard to, concerning
(emphasizes that sth is precisely or exactly as stated), precisely, exactly, even, if, just like, in the same way as
that is, i.e.
will, shall, to be going to
in other words, that is
already at an earlier time
in other words, that is to say, so, thus
accomplishment, success, achievement, to achieve (a result), to create, to bring about
granted that, even if
to go to sleep, to go to bed (literary)
to see a doctor, to seek medical advice
to take office, to assume a post
to receive medical treatment
to bring up, to train, to contribute to, achievements (usually of young people)
to yield, to adapt to, to accommodate to (sth)
looking for employment, getting a job, to start a career
nearby, in a close neighborhood
to follow the prescribed order; to keep to the working routine (idiom)
to dine
to get there in one step (idiom); easily done, success at a stroke, to get results overnight
